title: Gluten-free coconut biscuits
ingredients: ['1 egg, beaten', '90g desiccated coconut', '60g rice flour (or a mix of rice, soy and buckwheat flours)', '1 teaspoon gluten-free baking powder', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '125g butter', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '325g sultanas, chopped dates, almonds, apricots or roasted buckwheat']
